main event: A couple observed a bright propelled glint of light while driving from Tarpon Springs to St. Petersburg on the night of December 1, 1948.
interesting points: The light moved at high speed parallel to the horizon,The witness described the object as having a brilliant white light with a long tail,Another object appeared with increasing intensity of color, appearing cherry-red next to the white light,The witness felt a sense of awe regarding the potential for destruction from the object,The couple did not report the sighting to the media to avoid publicity.
sighted object: a bright propelled glint of light
witness description: the husband and wife were driving in their car
